short.am,ar,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,et,fa,: Encoding/Decoding Plugin for various types of encoding like base64, rot13 or unix timestamp conversion
short.bg: Encoding/Decoding Plugin за различни типове кодиране като base64, rot13 или unix timestamp преобразуване
short.bn: বেস 64, রট 13 বা ইউনিক্স টাইমস্ট্যাম্প রূপান্তর যেমন এনকোডিংয়ের বিভিন্ন ধরণের জন্য এনকোডিং / ডিকোডিং প্লাগইন
short.ca: Plugin de Codificació/Decodificació per a diferents tipus de codificació com base64, rot13 o unix
short.cs: (De)kódovací plugin pro různé typy kódování jako base64, rot13 nebo unix timestamp
short.da: Encoding/Decoding plugin for forskellige typer af encodings såsom base65, rot13 eller unix tidsstempel konvertering
short.de: Encoding/Decoding Erweiterung für verschiedene Encodings wie base64, rot13 oder Unixzeit
short.el: Plugin για κρυπτογράφηση/αποκρυπτογράφηση πολλαπλών τύπων όπως base64, rot13 ή μετατροπή unix timestamp
short.es: Plugin de Codificación/Decodificación para varios tipos de codificación como base64, rot13 o unix
short.fi: Enkoodaus/Dekoodaus laajennus usealle eri enkoodausmenetelmälle, kuten base64, rot13 tai unix aikaleimojen käännöksille.
short.fil: Encoding o Decoding Plugin para sa iba'y ibang tipo ng encoding tulad ng base64, rot13 o unix timestamp conversyon
short.fr: Plugin d'encodage / décodage de différents types comme: base64, rot13 ou unix
short.hi: विभिन्न प्रकार के इनकोडिंग और डिकोडिंग प्लग-इन जैसे Base 64, rot13 और unix टाइमस्टैम्प परिवर्तन
short.hr: Enkoding/Dekoding dodatak za različite tipove enkodiranja kao što su base64, rot13 ili unix timestamp konverzija
short.hu: Kódoló/Dekódoló beépülő modul több típusú kódoláshoz pl. base64, rot13 vagy UNIX időbélyeg konverzió
short.id: Encoding/Decoding Plugin digunakan untuk bermacam-macam tipe penyandian seperti base64, rot13 atau konversi unix timestamp
short.it: Plugin di codifica/decodifica per vari tipi di codifica come base64, rot13 o conversione timestamp unix
short.ja: base64, rot13, unix タイムスタンプ変換といった様々なタイプのエンコーディングのためのエンコーディング/デコーディングプラグイン
short.kn: ಬೇಸ್ 64, ರಾಟ್ 13 ಅಥವಾ ಯುನಿಕ್ಸ್ ಟೈಮ್‌ಸ್ಟ್ಯಾಂಪ್ ಪರಿವರ್ತನೆಯಂತಹ ವಿವಿಧ ರೀತಿಯ ಎನ್‌ಕೋಡಿಂಗ್‌ಗಾಗಿ ಎನ್‌ಕೋಡಿಂಗ್ / ಡಿಕೋಡಿಂಗ್ ಪ್ಲಗಿನ್
short.ko: base64, rot13 또는 unix 타임 스탬프 변환과 같은 여러 유형의 암호화 / 복호화를위한 플러그인
short.lt: Užkodavimo/dekodavimo plėtinys įvairių tipų kodavimui, pvz.: base64, rot13 ar unix laiko žymos konvertavimas
short.mr: base64, rot13 किंवा unix timestamp रूपांतरण अशा विविध प्रकारच्या एन्कोडिंग / डिकोडिंग साठी प्लगइन
short.ms: Pengekodan / Penyahkodan Plugin untuk pelbagai jenis pengekodan seperti penukaran cap waktu base64, rot13 atau unix
short.nl: Plug-in voor codering/decodering voor verschillende soorten codering, zoals base64-, rot13- of unix-tijdstempel
short.no: Encoding/Decoding Plugin for ulike kodinger som base64, rot13 og unix timestamp conversion
short.pl: Dodatek do przeglądarki pozwalający na kodowanie i odkodowywanie różnych rodzajów kodowania, takich jak base64, rot13 lub czasu…
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Plugin de Encoding/Decoding para vários tipos de encoding como base64, rot13 ou conversão de unix timestamps
short.ru: Плагин для кодирования/декодирования различных кодировок: base64, rot13 или преобразования временных меток unix
short.th: ปลั๊กอินส์สำหรับเข้ารหัสหรือถอดรหัสในรูปแบบต่างๆ เช่น base64, rot13, หรือ แปลง unix timestamp
short.tr: Base64, rot13 veya unix timestamp dönüşümü gibi çeşitli kodlama türleri için Kodlama / Kod Çözme Eklentisi
short.uk: Плагін для кодування/декодування різноманітних видів кодувань, таких як: base64, rot13 або перетворення часових міток unix
short.zh_CN: 编码/解码插件，支持包括base64，rot13 或unix timestamp编码的转换
short.zh_TW: 提供編碼/解碼功能的套件，支持 base64，rot13 或 unix timestamp 編碼轉換

long.ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,fi,fil,fr,hi,:
This extension enables you to encode and decode selected text via the context menu. This reduces the time you spend on looking up values and gives you more time to concentrate on the important things of development. 

Version 1.3.0 introduced a new in-clipboard-conversion which will allow you to copy text into your clipboard and select a conversion from the menu(when no text is selected). After the conversion the new text ist pasted back into your clipboard.

The context menu this extension enables is customizable through the options page. To get there either click on the item or go to Wrench -> Tools -> Extensions -> d3coder options.

Via the popup you are able to choose between 5 message types: alert the result, display the result via native HTML5 notifications, inject a DIV-element to the pages bottomm, via console.log() or replacing the selected text on the page.

You can also deactivate functions( e.g. if you don't need and want to free the space they use).

The current version has implemented the following en-/decoding functions:

- Unix Timestamp
- rot13
- base64
- CRC32/MD5/SHA1 hashing
- bin2hex
- bin2txt
- HTML entity
- HTML specialchars
- URI encode
- Quoted printables
- Escapeshellarg
- (PHP) Unserialize
- "L33T"-speak
- reverse
long.am,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,et,fa,gu,:
This extension enables you to encode and decode selected text via the context menu. This reduces the time you spend on looking up values and gives you more time to concentrate on the important things of development. 

The context menu this extension enables is customizable through the options page. To get there either click on the item or go to Wrench -> Tools -> Extensions -> d3coder options.

Via the popup you are able to choose between four message types: alert the result, adding a DIV-element to the bottom of the page, via console.log() or replacing the selected text on the page.

You can also deactivate functions(e.g. if you don't need them and want to free the space they use).

The current version has implemented the following en-/decoding functions:

- Unix Timestamp
- rot13
- base64
- CRC32/MD5/SHA1 hashing
- bin2hex
- bin2txt
- HTML entity
- HTML specialchars
- URI encode
- Quoted printables
- Escapeshellarg
- (PHP) Unserialize
- "L33T"-speak
- reverse
